Package org.twelve.controllers

Class ControllerPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.twelve.controllers.ControllerPool
  • public class ControllerPool
extends java.lang.Object
    Initializes controllers and provides a pool for accessing them

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ControllerPool​(java.util.Locale selectedLanguage, boolean demoMode)
      Creates all the required controllers for the program

        public ControllerPool​(java.util.Locale selectedLanguage,

        Creates all the required controllers for the program
        Parameters:
        selectedLanguage - the selected language the controllers should use
        demoMode - whether or not the program should run in demo mode
